mapper.select: SELECT p.id as p_id,p.role_id as p_role_id,gp.id as gp_id,prop_name,prop_describe,pp.the_number as the_number FROM packsack p, packsack_prop pp, game_prop gp WHERE p.id = pp.packsack_id AND pp.prop_id = gp.id AND p.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT p.id as p_id,p.user_id as p_role_id,gp.id as gp_id,prop_name,prop_describe,pp.the_number as the_number FROM packsack_user p, packsack_user_prop pp, game_prop gp WHERE p.id = pp.packsack_user_id AND pp.prop_id = gp.id AND p.user_id = #{userId}
